Strategy.StartDialog: I know of the 'QuestItemQC1', but I don't know what it does. Can you retrieve it from 'NPCQC2' and see what you can learn? \nGreat! Tell me what you have learned afterwards.

Action.Dialog: Is the 'QuestItemQC1' what you're looking for? \nNo, no, I have no idea of it's meanings. It's to complicated for a simple sphere like me. \nBut at least I can give it to you!
Ah, yes the 'QuestItemQC1' is very mysterious. I could tell you how it works, but it's way to complicated. \nYou're smart, you say? Well.. -wispers- \nSo that's all there is to it.
Oh, that very interesting. I should use 'QuestItemQC1' wisely! \nGive it to me now, your work is done.

Strategy.StartDialog: 'NPCQC2' knows something, but he won't tell me. Can you go talk to him? Maybe he will tell you. \nThank you! Don't tell him you know me.

Action.Dialog: Hmm.. why should I trust you? \nNah, that's not good enough, but you can earn my trust! \nProve you're a real sphere by killing a square!
'NPCQC2' should trust me now!
Oke, oke you are very trustworthy! \nI'll tell you my secret now... \n-wispers-
Really? I didn't know that... That sneaky bastard.

Strategy.StartDialog: I have heard about this beautiful 'QuestItemQC1'... I desire to have it. \nBring it to me, peasant!

Action.Dialog: In the remains of your enemy, you found 'QuestItemQC1'.
Oh my, 'QuestItemQC1' is even more beautiful than I could imagine. \nThanks a lot for obtaining it for me!

Strategy.StartDialog: Two squared bastards have been harrassing me forever, but I can't do anything about it. Please kill them for me. \nThank you so much, now be on your way.

Action.Dialog: Now where is that other one?
I should report back to 'NPCQC1'.
I was so scared of them! \nThank you so much, I can finally sleep safely again.

Strategy.StartDialog: Did you ever hear of 'QuestItemQC1'?? It's really pretty! \nIf you can bring it to me, I will greatly reward you!

Action.Dialog: 'QuestItemQC1' you say? \nWell you're lucky to meet me, I saw one of those square bastards have it just a minute ago. \nIf you hurry, you should be able to find it!
In the remains of your enemy, you found 'QuestItemQC1'.
You found it! \nOh my I never thought I would see 'QuestItemQC1' with my own eyes! \nHere are your rewards, you have deserved it.

Strategy.QuestName: The slaughter of the squared bastard
Strategy.StartDialog: I bet you're not so strong as you say, haha! \nYou think I'm wrong? Than prove yourself! \nSlaughter those squared bastards and I will reward you.

Action.Dialog: Two more to go..
One more to go..
Aced it!
So you are good for something! \nGood job killing those bastards.

Strategy.StartDialog: You lost your little sister? \nI know how it feels to worry about your beloved ones... I don't know how my own sister is doing and with all these squares I'm to scared to leave my city. \nShe is in 'TownQC2', please go check on her.

Action.Dialog: You came from 'TownQC1' and you saw 'NPCQC1' you say? \nAwh, it's lovely that he thought of me. \nPlease let him know all is fine!
I am glad to here she's alright! \nYou deserve a reward, my friend. I would never have dared to leave my city.
